title: My One Regret
description: He was a rockstar. A Legend. And a Single Father. I should’ve stayed away. I just couldn’t resist him. We were happy until he texted. We need to talk. The last famous words But I knew I needed to let him go. It was over. We were never meant to be together. Just like everyone else, he left. I couldn’t handle touring with his rock band and a relationship Until I discovered Sadie. The love of my life. When I left her, I made the biggest mistake of my life. But when tragedy struck, my world came apart. You’ll love this emotional, breathtakingly beautiful Rockstar romance. Get it today.
author: Claudia Y. Burgoa
